person.persName: Samuel Thomas Hauser, Sr. (Judge, lawyer Falmouth)

body.p: Lawyer and County Judge in Falmouth, Pendleton County, Kentucky. Bethania, North Carolina native. Married to Mary Ann Kennett Hauser.
